title: Redirect footer “Contact Us” to the Telegram page

requirements.text: Update the footer “Contact Us” action at the bottom of the site so that clicking it navigates to the standalone Telegram route (`/telegram`) using the existing global route-transition UX (`startTransition`).

quotes: Can you redirectly user to the telegram page when user click on contacts us
The contact us at the bottum

acceptanceCriteria: In the site footer, clicking the “Contact Us” button navigates to `/telegram` (URL changes and the Telegram page renders).
The navigation uses the existing route-transition behavior (spinner overlay appears briefly, then destination page fades in).
The existing footer links (“Terms & Conditions”, “Privacy Policy”) continue to work as-is and are not broken by the change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under the frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Use the existing TanStack Router navigation pattern via `useRouteTransition().startTransition(...)` so the global spinner + fade-in behavior remains consistent.
nonGoals: Do not add a new Contact Us page or contact form.
Do not change the Telegram page content or the external Telegram destination URL behavior.
Do not change header navigation, plan flows, or any other footer layout/content beyond wiring the existing “Contact Us” click action.
